channel.title: EchoLog Blog
channel.description: Latest updates and insights from EchoLog about digital accessibility, voice assistants, and hands-free computing.

item.title: Proto Workbench: Online Protobuf Compiler & Decoder
item.description: Discover how Proto Workbench helps you compile JSON into Protobuf binary, decode Hex/Base64 into JSON, and debug gRPC payloads directly in the browser.
item.author: echolog07@gmail.com (Kshitij)

item.title: Why We Built the EchoLog JSON Formatter
item.description: Learn how the EchoLog JSON Formatter helps developers securely format, validate, and debug JSON data entirely in the browser, with no data ever leaving your device.
item.author: echolog07@gmail.com (Kshitij)

item.title: Enhancing Digital Accessibility: The Vision Behind EchoLog
item.description: EchoLog empowers users with visual and locomotive disabilities through intuitive voice-based navigation.
item.author: echolog07@gmail.com (Sneha Maheshwari)

item.title: The Future of Hands-Free Computing
item.description: Explore the rise of voice-assisted technology, gaze tracking, and gesture recognition in the future of computing.
item.author: echolog07@gmail.com (Sneha Maheshwari)
